title.rendered: Congratulations to Lake Avenue 5th Grader Hudson Bauer

content.rendered: Hudson Bauer, a Fifth Grader at Lake Avenue, won 2nd place from the Daughters of the American Revolution for his essay on, “What the Flag Means to Me.” Hudson was the youngest recipient of an award.

excerpt.rendered: Hudson Bauer, a Fifth Grader at Lake Avenue, won 2nd place from the Daughters of the American Revolution for his essay on, “What the Flag Means to Me.” Hudson was the youngest recipient of an award.
